summary: Applies a set of (including random) invertible transforms to input images, runs inference repeatedly in batches, inverses the spatial transforms on the outputs, aggregates the results to compute statistics such as mode, mean, standard deviation and variance‑of‑confidence, and optionally returns the full stacked predictions.
business_intent: Enable more reliable and uncertainty‑aware model predictions during deployment, especially for medical image segmentation, by leveraging test‑time augmentation to assess model confidence and improve decision‑making.
